hero.name: Mihai Cosmin Danaila
hero.description: Highly experienced Full-stack software developer with 8+ years in building scalable, high-performance web applications, across academic research (ETH & UZH) and Fintech (PostFinance & UniCredit) environments. Proficient in Python, React, and Java, with expertise in designing microservices, implementing CI/CD pipelines, and working in Agile/Scrum. Passionate in bridging the gap between complex domain requirements and production-ready microservices by developing impactful solutions, optimizing performance, and leveraging AI/ML for innovative applications.

about.title: My Journey
about.description:
I was born in Romania and moved to Italy at the age of three. After completing my studies in Computer Science at La Sapienza University in Rome, I began my professional career there. After a short period, I took the opportunity to move to Milan, driven by a long-term goal: reaching Switzerland, a land of opportunity, the place I had always imagined, where the mountains welcome you.

After a few years spent developing my skills in the fintech sector in Milan, I eventually moved to Switzerland. There, I discovered a wide range of new opportunities. I started studying German while continuing to work, until I decided to further invest in my education by pursuing a master’s degree.

I first entered academia and then enrolled in the Master’s program in Applied Computational Life Sciences at the ZHAW School of Life Sciences, which I completed part-time while working at the University of Zurich. After finishing my degree, I continued my academic path at ETH Zurich.

With artificial intelligence evolving rapidly, I am strongly motivated to be part of this technological transformation and to contribute to it in a meaningful way.

Outside of work and coding, I spend time at the gym. I am also a certified personal trainer and enjoy outdoor activities.
